Name: Frostfruit (PH)
Description: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.

DescriptionLocalization.es: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Sie ist mit einer merkwürdigen Eisschicht umhüllt. Wenn du in die eigentliche Frucht beißt, ist sie unglaublich saftig und süß.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.it: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Этот некий фрукт покрыт странной ледяной оболочкой. Если откусить кусочек, сей плод окажется безумно сочным и сладким.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: It's covered in a strange shell of ice. When you bite into the actual fruit, it's insanely juicy and sweet.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 它被一层奇怪的冰壳覆盖着。当你咬到真正的水果时，会发现它又甜又多汁。
